description: Returns existing recommendation preferences, such as enhanced infrastructure metrics. Use the scope parameter to specify which preferences to return. You can specify to return preferences for an organization, a specific account ID, or a specific EC2 instance or Auto Scaling group Amazon Resource Name (ARN). For more information, see Activating enhanced infrastructure metrics in the Compute Optimizer User Guide.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: The target resource type of the recommendation preference for which to return preferences. The Ec2Instance option encompasses standalone instances and instances that are part of Auto Scaling groups. The AutoScalingGroup option encompasses only instances that are part of an Auto Scaling group.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: An object that describes the scope of the recommendation preference to return. You can return recommendation preferences that are created at the organization level (for management accounts of an organization only), account level, and resource level. For more information, see Activating enhanced infrastructure metrics in the Compute Optimizer User Guide. name (string) --- The name of the scope. The following scopes are possible: Organization - Specifies that the recommendation preference applies at the organization level, for all member accounts of an organization. AccountId - Specifies that the recommendation preference applies at the account level, for all resources of a given resource type in an account. ResourceArn - Specifies that the recommendation preference applies at the individual resource level. value (string) --- The value of the scope. If you specified the name of the scope as: Organization - The value must be ALL_ACCOUNTS. AccountId - The value must be a 12-digit Amazon Web Services account ID. ResourceArn - The value must be the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an EC2 instance or an Auto Scaling group. Only EC2 instance and Auto Scaling group ARNs are currently supported.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the scope. The following scopes are possible:

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of the scope. If you specified the name of the scope as:

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of recommendation preferences to return with a single request. To retrieve the remaining results, make another request with the returned nextToken value.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to advance to the next page of recommendation preferences.

nested_items.name: recommendationPreferencesDetails
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe recommendation preferences.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the scope.
Organization - Specifies that the recommendation preference applies at the organization level, for all member accounts of an organization.
AccountId - Specifies that the recommendation preference applies at the account level, for all resources of a given resource type in an account.
ResourceArn - Specifies that the recommendation preference applies at the individual resource level.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the scope.
Organization - The value must be ALL_ACCOUNTS.
AccountId - The value must be a 12-digit Amazon Web Services account ID.
ResourceArn - The value must be the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an EC2 instance or an Auto Scaling group.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The target resource type of the recommendation preference to create.

nested_items.name: enhancedInfrastructureMetrics
nested_items.description: The status of the enhanced infrastructure metrics recommendation preference.

nested_items.name: inferredWorkloadTypes
nested_items.description: The status of the inferred workload types recommendation preference.

nested_items.name: externalMetricsPreference
nested_items.description: An object that describes the external metrics recommendation preference.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: Contains the source options for external metrics preferences.

nested_items.name: lookBackPeriod
nested_items.description: The preference to control the number of days the utilization metrics of the Amazon Web Services resource are analyzed. If the preference isn't set, this object is null.

nested_items.name: utilizationPreferences
nested_items.description: The preference to control the resource's CPU utilization threshold, CPU utilization headroom, and memory utilization headroom. If the preference isn't set, this object is null.

nested_items.name: metricName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource utilization metric name to customize.

nested_items.name: metricParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters to set when customizing the resource utilization thresholds.

nested_items.name: threshold
nested_items.description: The threshold value used for the specified metric parameter.

nested_items.name: headroom
nested_items.description: The headroom value in percentage used for the specified metric parameter.
CPU utilization: PERCENT_30 | PERCENT_20 | PERCENT_0
Memory utilization: PERCENT_30 | PERCENT_20 | PERCENT_10

nested_items.name: preferredResources
nested_items.description: The preference to control which resource type values are considered when generating rightsizing recommendations. This object resolves any wildcard expressions and returns the effective list of candidate resource type values. If the preference isn't set, this object is null.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the preferred resource list.

nested_items.name: includeList
nested_items.description: The list of preferred resource values that you want considered as rightsizing recommendation candidates.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: effectiveIncludeList
nested_items.description: The expanded version of your preferred resource's include list.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: excludeList
nested_items.description: The list of preferred resources values that you want excluded from rightsizing recommendation candidates.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: savingsEstimationMode
nested_items.description: Describes the savings estimation mode used for calculating savings opportunity.
